title: User Registration
column9: I want to register with email and password so that I can access the platform.

title: User Login
column9: I want to log in to my account so that I can access my dashboard.

title: Seller Dashboard
column9: I want to see a dashboard of my active and ended listings so that I can track my sales.

title: Create Container Listing
column9: I want to create a new container listing with photos and details so that I can put it up for auction.

title: Edit Listing
column9: I want to edit a listing before bids are placed so that I can correct errors.

title: Browse Listings
column9: I want to browse and filter available containers so that I can find what I need.

title: View Listing Details
column9: I want to view full details and photos of a container so that I can make an informed decision.

title: Place Bid
column9: I want to place a bid on an active auction so that I can try to win the item.

title: Bid History
column9: I want to see the history of bids on a listing so that I understand the competition.

title: Auction Timer
column9: I want to see a countdown timer for each auction so that I know when it ends.

title: Auction End Notification
column9: I want to see a notification when I win or lose an auction so that I know the outcome.

title: Admin User Management
column9: I want to view and manage registered users so that I can maintain platform security.

title: Admin Listing Moderation
column9: I want to remove inappropriate listings so that I can keep the marketplace clean.

title: Payment Instructions
column9: I want to see payment instructions after winning so that I can complete the purchase.
